summary: Completed frontend testing of Lawvek B2B SaaS website Integrations section. All 10 company logos render correctly with high-quality SVG icons. All features work as expected with no console errors.
passed_tests: Integrations section renders correctly at / (scrolled into view)
All 10 integration logo icons visible and rendered with SVG content
Left column icons: Slack (colorful hashtag logo), Gmail (M envelope), Microsoft Teams (purple T), Ironclad (green geometric H), SpotDraft (blue lightning bolt on blue background)
Right column icons: HubSpot (orange sprocket figure), Google Docs (blue document), Microsoft Word (blue/dark blue W), Notion (white background with N), Jira (blue chevron shapes)
Central Lawvek hub renders with 'L' text and animated glow effect
37 SVG connection paths render between logos and central hub
14 animated dots (SVG circles) flow along connection paths
Integration section CTA button 'Get Priority Access' is visible and clickable
CTA button click navigates smoothly (anchor link to #cta)
No console errors on page load
Page scrolling works smoothly to integrations section

All integration icon data-testid attributes present and working (integration-icon-slack, integration-icon-gmail, integration-icon-microsoft-teams, integration-icon-ironclad, integration-icon-spotdraft, integration-icon-hubspot, integration-icon-google-docs, integration-icon-microsoft-word, integration-icon-notion, integration-icon-jira)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 10 integration logos in the IntegrationsSection have been verified: Slack, Gmail, Microsoft Teams, Ironclad, SpotDraft on left side; HubSpot, Google Docs, Microsoft Word, Notion, Jira on right side. All logos render as high-quality SVG icons matching their recognizable brand designs. The central Lawvek hub displays correctly with animated amber glow. Connection lines and flowing animated dots work correctly. The 'Get Priority Access' CTA button in the integrations section is functional.
